The Ur-Dragon.plan: Dragon tribal ramp with treasure support; curve to high-impact dragons and anthem effects.
The Ur-Dragon.notes: Prioritise dragon cost reducers, tutors like Sarkhan's Triumph, and board-wide haste enablers.

Edgar Markov.plan: Low-curve vampire aggro with token multipliers and +1/+1 counters.
Edgar Markov.notes: Maximise vampire ETB token makers and haste support.

Atraxa, Praetors' Voice.plan: Choose a focused proliferate shell (infect, superfriends, or +1/+1 counters) and double down.
Atraxa, Praetors' Voice.notes: Support with protective spells and repeatable proliferate engines.

Krenko, Mob Boss.plan: Explosive goblin token swarm leveraging extra damage on ETB/attack.
Krenko, Mob Boss.notes: Include Impact Tremors effects and haste enablers to snowball.

Kaalia of the Vast.plan: Cheat massive angels, demons, and dragons into play while protecting Kaalia.
Kaalia of the Vast.notes: Emphasise protective equipment/auras and game-ending bombs.

Pantlaza, Sun-Favored.plan: Dinosaur tribal ramp with discover and blink synergies.
Pantlaza, Sun-Favored.notes: Lean on cost reducers and ramp to chain discover triggers.

Sauron, the Dark Lord.plan: Amass-oriented zombie tokens with wheels and reanimation loops.
Sauron, the Dark Lord.notes: Support with discard draw sevens and large payoff enchantments.

Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow.plan: Tempo ninjutsu deck leveraging evasive one-drops and top-deck manipulation.
Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow.notes: Include bounce/flicker to reuse triggers and keep curve extremely low.

Lathril, Blade of the Elves.plan: Elf tribal tokens into overrun finishers with mana engine support.
Lathril, Blade of the Elves.notes: Ensure sufficient anthem effects and elf-based card draw.

Kenrith, the Returned King.plan: Flexible political toolbox leveraging activated abilities and combo lines.
Kenrith, the Returned King.notes: Support with mana sinks and tutors that fetch specific ability combos.

Giada, Font of Hope.plan: Mono-white angel ramp with +1/+1 counters and lifegain support.
Giada, Font of Hope.notes: Add artifact ramp to cast expensive angels on curve.

Jodah, the Unifier.plan: Five-color legendary tribal with cascade-style value.
Jodah, the Unifier.notes: Prioritise mana fixing and legendary payoff permanents.

Miirym, Sentinel Wyrm.plan: Temur dragon tribal doubling key ETB effects via clones.
Miirym, Sentinel Wyrm.notes: Include token-friendly payoff like Parallel Lives and treasure ramp.

The Wise Mothman.plan: Mutant-themed mill with proliferate and +1/+1 counter synergies.
The Wise Mothman.notes: Use self-mill for value and rad counter payoffs.

Nekusar, the Mindrazer.plan: Wheel-based group slug that punishes opposing card draw.
Nekusar, the Mindrazer.notes: Ensure redundancy in wheel effects and damage doublers.

Y'shtola, Night's Blessed.plan: Spellslinger control leveraging noncreature spells for damage and lifegain.
Y'shtola, Night's Blessed.notes: Keep curve low with instant-speed interaction and storm-style payoffs.

Isshin, Two Heavens as One.plan: Attack-trigger doubling with token makers, equipment, and extra combats.
avoid: board wipes that reset your own army
Isshin, Two Heavens as One.notes: Prioritise creatures with impactful attack triggers and mass haste.

Hakbal of the Surging Soul.plan: Merfolk tribal with +1/+1 counters, explore, and evasion.
Hakbal of the Surging Soul.notes: Include islandwalk enablers and tempo plays.

Ulalek, Fused Atrocity.plan: Colorless Eldrazi ramp with sacrifice loops and ping payoffs.
Ulalek, Fused Atrocity.notes: Stack mana rocks and token producers to fuel annihilator threats.

Ms. Bumbleflower.plan: Wheel-centric group hug with +1/+1 counters and token production.
Ms. Bumbleflower.notes: Support with pillow-fort pieces and payoff creatures that scale with draw.

Teysa Karlov.plan: Orzhov aristocrats strategy doubling death triggers to drain opponents and generate value from creature sacrifice.
Teysa Karlov.notes: Prioritize Blood Artist effects, token generators like Bitterblossom, and free sacrifice outlets such as Viscera Seer. Key engines include Pitiless Plunderer and Grave Pact. Keep curve low for repeatable sacrifice loops.

Korvold, Fae-Cursed King.plan: Jund sacrifice engine that turns permanents into cards and +1/+1 counters, often combo-finishing through treasure or food loops.
Korvold, Fae-Cursed King.notes: Dockside Extortionist and Mayhem Devil are premium. Include fetchlands and token producers to ensure consistent sacrifice fodder. Avoid too many nonpermanent spells; Korvold thrives on permanents.

Meren of Clan Nel Toth.plan: Graveyard recursion engine using experience counters to repeatedly reanimate value creatures.
Meren of Clan Nel Toth.notes: Include Sakura-Tribe Elder, Fleshbag Marauder, and Spore Frog loops. Prioritize cheap creatures that sacrifice themselves. Avoid too many high-CMC threats that don't generate immediate value.

Animar, Soul of Elements.plan: Creature combo deck reducing creature costs with +1/+1 counters to enable explosive chains and combo finishes.
Animar, Soul of Elements.notes: Ancestral Statue enables infinite counters. Prioritize low-cost creatures and ETB value like Cloud of Faeries. Animar rewards creature density above all else.

Prosper, Tome-Bound.plan: Rakdos value engine generating Treasures from exile-based card advantage.
Prosper, Tome-Bound.notes: Include Jeska's Will, Reckless Impulse effects, and Marionette Master as a finisher. Prosper thrives when nearly every turn generates exile value.

Winota, Joiner of Forces.plan: Explosive combat strategy cheating powerful Humans into play via non-Human attackers.
Winota, Joiner of Forces.notes: Include cheap non-Humans like Ornithopter and powerful Humans like Angrath's Marauders. Avoid diluting Human count. Fast mana accelerates lethal turns.

Selvala, Heart of the Wilds.plan: Green ramp engine generating explosive mana through high-power creatures, often enabling combo wins.
Selvala, Heart of the Wilds.notes: Umbral Mantle enables infinite mana. Include high-power creatures like Regal Force. Selvala rewards power-based scaling.

Urza, Lord High Artificer.plan: Artifact combo/control deck leveraging artifact density for mana and value.
Urza, Lord High Artificer.notes: Include cheap artifacts and mana rocks. Dramatic Reversal combos with Isochron Scepter. Urza requires high artifact density to function.

Najeela, the Blade-Blossom.plan: Warrior tribal combat combo deck capable of infinite combat steps with sufficient mana.
Najeela, the Blade-Blossom.notes: Derevi, Empyrial Tactician or Druids' Repository enable infinite combats. Prioritize cheap Warriors and combat enablers.

Arcades, the Strategist.plan: Defender tribal deck turning high-toughness creatures into card draw and combat threats.
Arcades, the Strategist.notes: Wall of Omens and Overgrown Battlement are core. Focus on cheap defenders to maximize draw triggers.

Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver.plan: Zombie tribal aristocrats deck generating decayed tokens and leveraging death triggers.
Wilhelt, the Rotcleaver.notes: Include Rooftop Storm and Gravecrawler loops. Wilhelt rewards Zombie density and sacrifice engines.

Sythis, Harvest's Hand.plan: Enchantress value engine drawing cards and gaining life from enchantment casts.
Sythis, Harvest's Hand.notes: Argothian Enchantress and Sterling Grove are premium. Sythis thrives with 30+ enchantments.

Kess, Dissident Mage.plan: Grixis spell-slinger combo deck recasting key instants and sorceries from graveyard.
Kess, Dissident Mage.notes: Demonic Consultation and Underworld Breach combos are common. Protect Kess to maximize spell recursion.

Brago, King Eternal.plan: Blink control deck abusing ETB triggers through repeated flicker effects.
Brago, King Eternal.notes: Strionic Resonator and mana rocks enable infinite flicker loops. Prioritize strong ETB creatures.

Chatterfang, Squirrel General.plan: Token swarm aristocrats deck converting token production into removal and combo finishes.
Chatterfang, Squirrel General.notes: Pitiless Plunderer and Earthcraft are powerful. Chatterfang scales explosively with token multipliers.

Zada, Hedron Grinder.plan: Mono-red spell combo deck copying single-target spells across a wide board for explosive turns.
Zada, Hedron Grinder.notes: Expedite and Crimson Wisps become massive draw engines. Maintain wide board presence.

Feather, the Redeemed.plan: Boros value engine recurring targeted instants to generate continuous card advantage.
Feather, the Redeemed.notes: Defiant Strike and Shelter are core. Feather requires cheap spells that target your own creatures.

Omnath, Locus of Creation.plan: Landfall value deck generating incremental advantage and burst mana from land drops.
Omnath, Locus of Creation.notes: Fetchlands maximize triggers. Include Scute Swarm and Omnath synergy loops.

Tasigur, the Golden Fang.plan: Sultai control/combo deck leveraging delve and political recursion.
Tasigur, the Golden Fang.notes: Fill graveyard efficiently. Infinite mana with Deadeye Navigator loops is common.

Muldrotha, the Gravetide.plan: Permanent-based recursion engine replaying permanents from graveyard each turn.
Muldrotha, the Gravetide.notes: Include permanent-based removal and ramp like Seal of Primordium and Sakura-Tribe Elder. Avoid too many instants and sorceries.
